resources.string:
Version %s

 It is an application that displays text files.
 -character string display(No line break, line break at the right edge of the screen, a new line at the right edge of the screen word)
 -Hex Decimal display
 -Display text as a text file other than the file
 -Maximum file size is 1GB. Read the measured value in the Sony Xperia Acro: is 3MB/seconds.
 
 External Library: juniversalchardet 1.0.3
